summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing for Yacco EMR after GitHub main-TESTING-STAGE branch restoration. All regions, hospitals, and staff credential data verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Health Check - API responding with correct Yacco EMR API message
Regions Endpoint - Returns all 16 Ghana regions with hospital counts
Greater Accra Hospitals - Ashaiman Polyclinic and Korle Bu hospitals found
Eastern Region Hospitals - Eastern Region Regional Health Center found
Super Admin Login - ygtnetworks@gmail.com / test123 authentication works
Auth Me Endpoint - Returns proper user information after authentication
Hospital Count Verification - Confirmed 9+ hospitals across 8+ regions as expected
Ashaiman Physician Login - physicianicu@pysicianicu.com authentication works
Eastern IT Admin Login - itadmin@eastern.com authentication works
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: N/A (backend-only testing)
